text: A rich, rustic soup made with beef, corn, squash, and aromatic herbs. Slow-cooked and deeply flavorful, it’s a comforting dish that brings families together around the table.
Handmade tortillas filled with squash blossoms, cheese, and epazote. Light, fragrant, and full of regional character — a vegetarian favorite with deep cultural roots.
Sweet bars made from puffed amaranth and honey, often mixed with nuts or dried fruit. Nutritious and festive, they’re a traditional snack enjoyed during fairs and celebrations.
